name: Monsterpunk Bestiary
description:
The Monsterpunk Bestiary has 45 entries of premade enemies to use in your Monsterpunk campaign. 

Each entry comes with worldbuilding information as well as roleplaying and tactical advice. 

Every creature has a statblock going all the way from levels 1 to 10 and comes with a few modification tips to quickly customize them into something else, turning gargoyles into vampiric ghosts and krakens into eldritch horrors from outer space. 

Other features of the Bestiary include:

  • 6 entries for every faction. The rest are independent, unaligned monsters.
  • 6 entries for various types of humans, from combat cyborgs to druids to a Magnasapiens warlord.
  • 5 entries that aren't traditional combat encounters and either use variant rules, pit PCs against each other, or must be solved entirely with roleplaying.
  • 24 new Features, 2 of which include sub-features such as Born of the Elements (with 8 different Elements to choose from) and The Deadly Seven (with 7 different Sins to choose from) each having different effects.
  • 2 new Support Techs, one of which lets the user Teleport through the angles of time.
  • 19 new Basic Techs, including Hypnosis to put enemies to sleep and Tremors to attack in area from underground.
  • 45 new Advanced Techs, 4 of which cause new Ailments (Polymorph, Confusion, Petrification and Infestation).
  • An Appendix at the end that lists every new ability in the supplement so you can port them into your own creations or use them as starting points to make your own Features and Techs.
